thread.title: Gold Coast Luxury Resorts Offers 70% off on Holiday Rental Bookings
thread.title_full: Gold Coast Luxury Resorts Offers 70% off on Holiday Rental Bookings

author: prbuzz.com
title: Gold Coast Luxury Resorts Offers 70% off on Holiday Rental Bookings
text:
Gold Coast Luxury Resorts, Broadbeach, Australia now allows their clients to get as much as 70% off on holiday rental bookings.
Noticing that people need a good and affordable place to stay during the holiday season, the Gold Coast Luxury Resorts now lets their customers save up to 70% on their holiday rental bookings, to make the stay of their clients more memorable and enjoyable.
Finding a place to stay is a big issue. Not only do the good resorts get booked in advanced during the holiday season, they also increase their rates to make as much profit as possible. However, under such circumstances, the news about the Gold Coast Luxury Resorts, Australia offering discounted rates has been welcomed by the tourists and explorers, who were planning on visiting the area during the holiday season.
In their recent post on their website, the Gold Coast Resorts said that their clients can save up to 70% on Gold Coast holiday rentals. They also mentioned that their focus is on making the experience of their clients as much affordable and memorable as possible, so that they can enjoy the holiday season to their full extent.
Talking about the variety of rental options, the Gold Coast Luxury Resorts (GCLR) said that they have a number of different options for people with varying needs, sizes, and budget. While they have the Hedges Ave holiday home in Mermaid Beach with five bedroom choices, they also offer four bedroom options such as the Kalimna or Rudd Mansion near the Broadbeach. In addition to the basic necessities such as upgraded equipment, and furnished kitchens, they have also equipped their resorts with the pools to let their clients enjoy the beautiful weather of the Gold Coast.
They Gold Coast Resorts also provides access to the extras such as the private cinemas, and apartments, to make the trip memorable regardless of whether one is looking for a romantic getaway, or wishes to spend some quality time with their family.
The Gold Coast Luxury Resorts, being a division of the Gold Coast Rental Properties offers the luxury homes and holiday resorts across the Gold Coast. They provide a number of benefits to their clients, and provide them access to exclusive services such as private cinemas, and apartments. Their head office is situated near Broadbeach, Queensland, Australia.
